Class MessageDisplay

java.lang.Object
  uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.MessageDisplay

public final class MessageDisplay
extends Object

Allows messages to be displayed in the most appropriate manner to the user.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Martin Waller

public static void unknownElementWarning(String unknownElement,
                                         String containerElement)
Displays a special warning for unknown XML elements when reading XML files

Parameters:
unknownElement - The name of the element which was not recognised
containerElement - The name of the element which contains the unrecognised element
